building_blocks.name: Documentation
building_blocks.about: Simple, easy to understand, documentation of what an API does, that is kept up to date with API roadmap.
building_blocks.category_about: What is provided when it comes to documentation for the platform? There are a number of proven building blocks available when it comes to API documentation.

building_blocks.name: List of Endpoints
building_blocks.about: A simple listing of all endpoints provides a quick introduction of what is available with an API.
building_blocks.category_about: What is provided when it comes to documentation for the platform? There are a number of proven building blocks available when it comes to API documentation.

building_blocks.name: Interactive Documentation
building_blocks.about: Interactive, hands-on documentation, provided by common approaches like Swagger and API Blueprint.
building_blocks.category_about: What is provided when it comes to documentation for the platform? There are a number of proven building blocks available when it comes to API documentation.

building_blocks.name: API Explorer
building_blocks.about: API explorers allow users to make calls and explore REST APIs using a web interface.
building_blocks.category_about: What is provided when it comes to documentation for the platform? There are a number of proven building blocks available when it comes to API documentation.

building_blocks.name: Error Response Codes
building_blocks.about: Provide a robust, complete, clear and meaningful list of API error response codes.
